name: feimakeup-site
description: Fei Lin Bridal Makeup & Hair static site

scripts.img:webp:thumbs: powershell -NoLogo -Command "Get-ChildItem images/thumbs -Filter *.jpg | ForEach-Object { npx sharp -i $_.FullName -o images/thumbs -f webp -q 82 -p }"
scripts.img:webp:fulls: powershell -NoLogo -Command "Get-ChildItem images/fulls -Filter *.jpg | ForEach-Object { npx sharp -i $_.FullName -o images/fulls -f webp -q 82 -p }"
scripts.img:avif:thumbs: powershell -NoLogo -Command "Get-ChildItem images/thumbs -Filter *.jpg | ForEach-Object { npx sharp -i $_.FullName -o images/thumbs -f avif -q 50 }"
scripts.img:avif:fulls: powershell -NoLogo -Command "Get-ChildItem images/fulls -Filter *.jpg | ForEach-Object { npx sharp -i $_.FullName -o images/fulls -f avif -q 50 }"
scripts.img:optimize: npm run img:webp:thumbs && npm run img:webp:fulls && npm run img:avif:thumbs && npm run img:avif:fulls
scripts.build: npm run sass:build && npm run sass:prod
